msbt.message: How is your Bunny Day so far? Having fun? Are you finding lots of eggs, ?
I felt like wearing something special for Bunny Day. I hope everyone likes it, !
Have you tried eating a Bunny Day candy egg yet? The designs look like they took so long I couldn't.
Have you seen any Bunny Day balloons? I heard that some are carrying DIY recipes!I'd love to shoot one down and see for myself, .
I found a really colorful message bottle on the beach. It's so pretty! I wonder who made it.
How is your egg hunt going?I heard someone say there might be eggs buried in the ground. Have you dug up any yet, ?
Did you know that Bunny Day balloons sometimes carry eggs?Just be careful if you shoot one down. You wouldn't want to drop an egg on someone, !
I went out fishing earlier and I caught an egg, .From the surface it looked like a fish and moved like a fish. But I reeled it in and it was an egg! So strange.
It's Bunny Day! Let's make it one to remember, .
It's Bunny Day at last! Let's try to collect as many eggs as we can, .
Oh! Perfect timing as always, .Somehow I ended up with some extra If it's not a burden, would you mind trading me some different eggs? Perhaps 3 of those for 3 of these?
Can do!
No, thanks.
Is your egg hunting going to plan, ?As for me Well, it could be better. A lot better, .I was actually wondering if you'd like to trade 3 different eggs for 3 of my ?
I'd be delighted!
Not right now.
How wonderful! I knew I could count on you. Now then, which eggs are you going to trade to me?
Really? I can't thank you enough! Now, which eggs are you going to trade?
Thank you so much! I'm so grateful that we got to spend some quality Bunny Day time together.
These eggs are extra special. That's because I got them from you, !Thank you so much, and happy Bunny Day, !
Oh, I'm sorry for the trouble. No worries at all. We'll just forget this ever happened.
Ah, if you've changed your mind, please don't worry yourself about it. Thanks for the chat!
OK! My for your .We'll trade 3 of each. Right?
That's correct!
Actually...
Alright, let's make the trade! How exciting.
Oh! I'm afraid we can't trade just yet because your pockets are full.I suppose it wasn't meant to be. I may check in later though. Maybe it'll work out next time!
